name: Grandma's Milk
description:
Co op Platformer

P1: Keyboard
P2: Controller

Controls:
Arrows / Left joystick - Move
Arrow up / A button - jump
Z / Left bumper - primary ability
X  / Right bumper - Secondary ability
Escape - pause game

Known bugs:
- P1 needs to move first (each level) or the abilities will be swapped.

Unknown bugs:
-
